bows.name: Hickory Shortbow
bows.description: A simple, unadorned bow made from a single piece of hickory. It's reliable for a novice archer.

bows.name: Recurve Bow
bows.description: The curved limbs of this bow store more energy, allowing for a more powerful shot than a standard shortbow.

bows.name: Hunter's Bow
bows.description: A well-balanced bow favored by trackers and hunters. The grip is worn smooth from years of patient use.

bows.name: Elven Longbow
bows.description: Crafted from supple yew wood with elegant, sweeping curves, this bow is deceptively powerful and remarkably light.

bows.name: Frost-Tipped Bow
bows.description: This bow is cool to the touch, and arrows nocked to its string are imbued with a chilling magic.

bows.name: Composite Greatbow
bows.description: Made from layers of horn, wood, and sinew. It requires considerable strength to draw, but its arrows fly with incredible force.

bows.name: Eagle's Eye
bows.description: A masterfully crafted bow that feels like an extension of the wielder's arm, making it easy to find and strike vital points.

bows.name: Wind-Swift Bow
bows.description: This bow hums with captured wind, allowing the archer to loose arrows with supernatural speed.

bows.name: Heartseeker
bows.description: An infamous bow, said to guide its arrows past armor and hide to find the heart of its target.

bows.name: Whisperwind, the Star-Piercer
bows.description: A legendary bow made from the branch of a celestial tree. Its arrows fly silently and split the very air, sometimes striking more than one foe at once.
